::KitKat::

She looked at the group around her.  She had Land Mine, Time Bomb, 
Drillbit, Phobia.  She wondered if she could talk to Terrorsaur about 
joining her.  She was getting fed up with Megatron.  She had lost her 
leg in the last battle because of his foolhearty plans.  Come to 
think of it, he went into battle without a real plan or stratagy.

She was beginning to think that maybe she could run the Pred pack.
She had a broad grin on her face.  But now wasn't the time to act.  
She waould have o make sure that the group would follow her and not 
go back to Megatron at the first sign of trouble.  She wondered if it 
was even possable.

She turned to Phobia, "You know, I was wondering, what would happen 
if we went and took the ship for Megatron without him knowing it. And 
then hand it over to him as a surprize? I wonder if he would like 
that?  I mean, he'd then have the best ship around.  He could then 
destroy the Maximals once and for all. And Megatron would be in 
command of the ship and he wouldn't have even gotten his hands 
dirty.  We would have done it for him.  I'll bet that would earn a 
little respect from him." She looked up at the ceiling with a wide 
grin on her face. "Yeah, he's be proud of us.  We could go and 
conquer the ship and just hand it over to him.  We do all the work 
and he gets the ship."

Just the it clicked in her head, they did all the work now and were 
getting nothing. A good crew must be paid well for thier efforts lest 
they leave or turn on you.  A good pack leader must take good care of 
a good crew.  Megatron wasn't doing anything but getting the group 
killed off one by one.  They had already lost Quickstrike and 
DarkMouse.  Who knows who was next to go meet the Matrix.
